name: VEVOR Electric Hoist, 1760 lbs 120V Electric Winch with 328 ft Wireless Remote Control, 40 ft Single Cable Lifting Height, Single/Double Slings, Emergency Stop, Lift Hoist for Garage Warehouse Factory
short_description: 328ft Wireless Remote Control: The electric hoist with wireless remote control is designed to meet your needs for lifting items over long distances. You can lift your items more easily and securely without having to extend the length of the handle cord yourself or use other tools. It comes emergency stop button to ensure secure operation

Two Modes of Operation: The electric hoist are equipped with braided steel cable for added stability and load capacity. Two options are offered to lift items: Single line lift: 880 lbs at 27.6 ft/min, max height: 40 ft; Double line lift: 1760 lbs at 13.8 ft/min, max height: 20 ft

Powerful Motor: The high-quality motor provides 950W of strong power, which can withstand large forces without causing deformation of the electric winch. In addition, the large cooling fan can quickly cool the machine to avoid overheating. Therefore, this powerful motor ensures efficient operation and saves you more time and energy

Built to Last: The electric hoist features a durable steel body that resists deformation, comes with a 19-strand thickened steel wire rope and high-strength metal hook—ensuring secure, stable lifting without breakage or wear, ideal for long-term use

Convenient to Install: You can easily hang the electric wire hoist on a ceiling or beam using the mounting brackets—installation takes just two effortless steps.It comes with a 13ft lifting sling strap and a 3.2ft shaft belt with metal ring.You can widely used in garages, factories, warehouses and families, as well as professionals and amateurs

name: AC-DK 2500 lb ATV/UTV Winch Synthetic Rope Kits, 12V Winch with Wireless Remote for Off Road Trailer Boat RV Towing Winches, Winch with Mounting Plate and Wired Remote
short_description: STANDARD INSTALLATION SIZE:AC-DK's new 2500 lb ATV synthetic rope winch kit not only includes all the winch accessories you need for easy use, but also standardizes the mounting dimensions to simplify the installation process, bringing you a new reliable experience. Fairlead Mounting Pattern: 4 1/4" (108mm); Mounting Plate 2-Hole: 3.10"(78mm )/3"(76mm) . Please ensure compatibility of mounting holes with your winch bracket before purchase.

NEW-ADVANCED CONTROL BOX: New winch solenoid relay contactor improve internal wiring and power: Old: It is easy to loosen and cannot be automatically disconnected; New: Anti -loosening, anti -self -starting, automatic power off functio. Also note that the minimum cold starting current for this winch is 10A.

STABLE PLANETARY GEAR SYSTEM: The 2500 lb. winch powered by a 0.9kw/1.2hp output permanent magnet DC 12V motor, provide more sufficient power and stable output, and reduce the problem of winch damage or winch burning due to insufficient power. Efficiency: 9 feet /min when fully loaded, 25 feet /min when empty.The winch uses an advanced combined planetary gear system with a gear speed ratio of 153:1, which is higher and faster than other winches, saving time and bringing a better experience.

DYNEEMA SYNTHETIC WINCH ROPE: Rope diameter length: 3/16''x34ft, dyneema rope is a strong and light water-resistant material. It's the safest winching material as it does not suffer from potential snapback. The rope will not degrade or lose any of its strength in wet conditions as it floats on water, avoiding any underwater debris. Universally suitable for Outlander, Renegade, DS, Maverick, Grizzly, Kodiak, Raptor 700R and YFZ450R, Pioneer, Foreman and Rancher Series, Brute Force, Teryx.

AFTER-SALES SERVICE AND GUARANTEE:All AC-DK winches come with one year of quality service and lifetime technical support. Should you notice the machine showing a bit of character now and then, or the controller becoming unexpectedly playful and not quite matching your pace, there's no cause for alarm! Simply reach out to us, and we pledge to resolve any issues for you within 12 hours, no matter when they arise. With AC-DK electric winches, Because your satisfaction is our driving force.

name: 3 in 1 Electric Hoist Winch,2200 lbs Manual/Wired/Wireless Remote Control,110/120V Portable Pure Copp Electric Winch Crane, 41ft Lifting Garage Lifter for Garage, Factory, Warehouse, Balcony
short_description: 【THREE CONTROL METHODS】Easily lift heavy objects with our versatile 3-in-1 electric hoist winch! Engineered to handle lifting capacities up to 2200 pounds and a rated load of 1100 pounds, it offers three convenient control options: manual, a 26.25-foot cable remote, and wireless remote control. Designed to meet a variety of lifting needs, this winch is perfect for streamlining your operations efficiently and securely. No matter the task, our electric hoist winch ensures you have the right tools at your fingertips.

【HIGH SECURITY】 Power Winch Crane is equipped with an industrial limit switch, cutting off power automatically when the machine is hoisted to a certain position. Its indicator design lets you know whether the machine is operating normally (GREEN) or has faults (RED). It also comes with a protective cover for extended service life. 26.25 FT of wired and wireless control keep you safely operating away from hazardous areas.

【Overload Protection】 Elevate your operations effortlessly with our sophisticated Lift Electric Hoist, featuring a 360° rotating hook and a robust carabiner design that ensures utmost safety against falls. Meticulously engineered for accuracy and security, our hoist is equipped with an intelligent limit switch that instantly halts the operation if the load surpasses its capacity or if it ascends to a critical height. Perform every lift safely and efficiently, shielded by our dependable overload protection.

【Powerful Motor】electric hoist 110 volt adopts 1500W universal motor, featuring small size and high power.Its high-power motor can lift at a speed of 16 feet per minute with a traction distance of 25FT. We also provide a 2204-pound - 3.2-foot lifting belt to help you complete lifting tasks immediately!

【Widely Used】Enhance your lifting and pulling tasks with our portable electric winch, designed for both outdoor and indoor use. Ideal for environments like factories, warehouses, garages, and construction sites, this winch comes equipped with a non-slip handle, a dust cover, and a reinforced fall-prevention device. It's the perfect tool for effortlessly managing heavy loads while ensuring top-notch safety and reliability. Elevate your operations with ease and confidence, wherever you are!
